data.name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Waaagh! Weapon Pack
data.detailed_description:
Ever think of anything else than just running berserk into the fray of battle? Ever think of anything ever? Then the Waaagh! Pack is for you! The Waaagh! Pack of weapons and armour for the Ork Faction includes four items among the rarest that will turn your character into the most savage warrior who ever chanted WAAAGH!These are visual customizations; they do not give any advantage but you don’t care as long as you can smash helmets in a classy way.

The Silver Shoota and the Silver Spike Knuckles are onlly available in this DLC pack on Steam. The Flat Top (hat) and the Lotted ‘umie Chest Armour are also available in the in-game store. The 4 items are only for the Orks.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 570 2.5GB or GTX 660 2GB or AMD HD7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Connection: 256 kbps upstream or faster. For more information about PC requirements, visit: http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/cyri/requirements/warhammer-40000-eternal-crusade/13067
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 780GTX or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Connection: 512 kbps upstream or faster. For more information about PC requirements, visit: http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/cyri/requirements/warhammer-40000-eternal-crusade/13067
